SECTION.HEADING: Total Verified Organizations
SECTION.QUERY: Select count(*) from tdc_user_registration_history where str_user_type='P' and dt_tr_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 group by decision order by decision

SECTION.HEADING: All Verified Organizations
SECTION.QUERY: select comp.COMPANY_NAME,GET_COUNTRY_NAME(M_COUNTRY)||',' ||M_STATE||','||M_ADDRESS||'-'||M_ZIP, get_user_name(str_user_id), userReg.str_designation,userReg.str_e_mail,to_char(dt_tr_date,'DD-MON-YYYY'),to_char(decision_date,'DD-MON-YYYY'),attempt_for_reg from tdc_user_registration_history userReg, creit_manufacturing_address manAddr,creit_company_master comp where userReg.company_id=comp.company_id and userReg.MAN_ADDRESS_ID=manAddr.MAN_ADDRESS_ID and decision='A' and str_user_type='P' and dt_tr_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 order by dt_tr_date,str_user_id,attempt_for_reg

SECTION.HEADING: All Rejected Organizations
SECTION.QUERY: Select comp.COMPANY_NAME,GET_COUNTRY_NAME(M_COUNTRY)||',' ||M_STATE||','||M_ADDRESS||'-'||M_ZIP , str_fname||' '||str_mname||' '||str_lname, str_designation,str_e_mail,to_chAR(userRegHis.dt_tr_date,'DD-MON-YYYY'),to_char(decision_date,'DD-MON-YYYY'),attempt_for_reg, nvl(remarks,'Not Available') from tdc_user_registration_history userRegHis,creit_manufacturing_address manAddr,creit_company_master comp where userRegHis.company_id=comp.company_id and userRegHis.MAN_ADDRESS_ID=manAddr.MAN_ADDRESS_ID and str_user_type='P' and decision='R' and userRegHis.dt_tr_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 order by userRegHis.dt_tr_date,str_user_id,attempt_for_reg

REPORT.HEADING: All Organizations who filed an application
REPORT.NAME: ShowAllManufacturersWhoFiledApplications

SECTION.HEADING: All Organizations who filed an application
SECTION.QUERY: SELECT get_user_name(cam.str_user_id),comp.COMPANY_NAME,GET_COUNTRY_NAME(manAddr.M_COUNTRY)||',' ||manAddr.M_STATE||','||manAddr.M_ADDRESS||'-'||manAddr.M_ZIP, count(cam.str_user_id) FROM creit_application_master cam,tdc_user_registration tur, creit_manufacturing_address manAddr,creit_company_master comp WHERE cam.str_user_id=tur.str_user_id and cam.version_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 and tur.company_id=comp.company_id and tur.MAN_ADDRESS_ID=manAddr.MAN_ADDRESS_ID group by cam.str_user_id,comp.COMPANY_NAME,GET_COUNTRY_NAME(manAddr.M_COUNTRY)||',' ||manAddr.M_STATE||','||manAddr.M_ADDRESS||'-'||manAddr.M_ZIP order by cam.str_user_id

SECTION.HEADING: Organizations and their Applications
SECTION.QUERY: SELECT get_user_name(cam.str_user_id),comp.COMPANY_NAME,GET_COUNTRY_NAME(manAddr.M_COUNTRY)||',' ||manAddr.M_STATE||','||manAddr.M_ADDRESS||'-'||manAddr.M_ZIP, application_id,to_char(version_dt,'dd-mm-yyyy'), get_status(str_status) FROM creit_application_master cam,tdc_user_registration tur, creit_manufacturing_address manAddr,creit_company_master comp WHERE cam.str_user_id=tur.str_user_id and cam.version_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 and tur.company_id=comp.company_id and tur.MAN_ADDRESS_ID=manAddr.MAN_ADDRESS_ID order by cam.str_user_id

SECTION.HEADING: Total number of applications
SECTION.QUERY: select get_status(str_status),count(*) from creit_application_master where version_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 and product_category like #2 and standard_id like #3 group by str_status order by get_status(str_status);

SECTION.HEADING: Submitted Applications
SECTION.QUERY: SELECT comp.COMPANY_NAME, GET_COUNTRY_NAME(manAddr.M_COUNTRY)||',' ||manAddr.M_STATE||','||manAddr.M_ADDRESS||'-'||manAddr.M_ZIP, cam.Application_id, cpc.category_desc,get_standard_number(cam.standard_id) , cam.PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(pRODUCT_SERIES,'NA'),to_chAR(NVL(cam.version_dt,SYSDATE),'DD-MON-YYYY'),get_status(cam.str_status) FROM creit_application_master cam,tdc_user_registration tur,creit_product_category cpc , creit_manufacturing_address manAddr,creit_company_master comp WHERE cam.str_user_id=tur.str_user_id AND cam.product_category=cpc.category_id and tur.company_id=comp.company_id and tur.MAN_ADDRESS_ID=manAddr.MAN_ADDRESS_ID and version_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 and cam.product_category like #2 and cam.standard_id like #3 order by get_status(cam.str_status);

SECTION.HEADING: Grouped By Product Category
SECTION.QUERY: select cpc.category_desc,count(application_id) FROM creit_application_master cam,creit_product_category cpc where cam.product_category=cpc.category_id and cam.product_category like #2 and cam.standard_id like #3 and cam.version_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 GROUP BY cpc.category_desc

SECTION.HEADING: Grouped By Indian Standard
SECTION.QUERY: select get_standard_number(standard_id),count(application_id) from creit_application_master where version_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 and product_category like #2 and standard_id like #3 GROUP BY get_standard_number(standard_id)

SECTION.HEADING: Grouped By Manufacturing Unit
SECTION.QUERY: SELECT comp.COMPANY_NAME,GET_COUNTRY_NAME(manAddr.M_COUNTRY)||',' ||manAddr.M_STATE||','||manAddr.M_ADDRESS||'-'||manAddr.M_ZIP, count(cam.Application_id) FROM creit_application_master cam,tdc_user_registration tur, creit_manufacturing_address manAddr,creit_company_master comp WHERE cam.str_user_id=tur.str_user_id and cam.version_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 and cam.product_category like #2 and cam.standard_id like #3 and tur.company_id=comp.company_id and tur.MAN_ADDRESS_ID=manAddr.MAN_ADDRESS_ID GROUP BY comp.COMPANY_NAME,GET_COUNTRY_NAME(manAddr.M_COUNTRY)||',' ||manAddr.M_STATE||','||manAddr.M_ADDRESS||'-'||manAddr.M_ZIP

SECTION.HEADING: Total Pending Applications
SECTION.QUERY: select count(distinct(num_proposal_id)) from tdc_po_proposal_tracker where str_status not in ('AC','RJ','AP','RD')

SECTION.HEADING: All Pending Applications
SECTION.QUERY: select num_proposal_id,get_user_name(str_assigned_to),decode(upper(str_user_type),'D','Dealer','R','Reviewing Officer','G','Granting Officer'), to_char(dt_allotment_date,'dd-mm-yyyy'), get_status(str_status),date_part('days',sysdate-dt_allotment_date) from tdc_po_proposal_tracker where str_status not in ('AC','RJ','AP','RD') order by num_proposal_id,date_part('days',sysdate-dt_allotment_date)

SECTION.HEADING: Number of Applications for each Lab
SECTION.QUERY: select get_lab_name(test_lab_id),count(product_model) from creit_application_model_test_dtl where test_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 group by test_lab_id order by get_lab_name(test_lab_id)

SECTION.HEADING: Models tested per Indian Standard
SECTION.QUERY: SELECT get_lab_name(camtd.test_lab_id),get_standard_number(cam.standard_id),camtd.application_id,get_user_name(camtd.tr_id), comp.COMPANY_NAME,GET_COUNTRY_NAME(manAddr.M_COUNTRY)||',' ||manAddr.M_STATE||','||manAddr.M_ADDRESS||'-'||manAddr.M_ZIP, camtd.product_model,to_char(camtd.test_dt,'dd-mm-yyyy') from creit_application_master cam, creit_application_model_test_dtl camtd, tdc_user_registration tur,creit_manufacturing_address manAddr,creit_company_master comp where cam.application_id= camtd.application_id and tur.MAN_ADDRESS_ID=manAddr.MAN_ADDRESS_ID and tur.company_id=comp.company_id and camtd.tr_id=tur.str_user_id and camtd.test_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 order by get_lab_name(camtd.test_lab_id),get_standard_number(cam.standard_id),camtd.application_id

SECTION.HEADING: Number of models tested per Indian Standard
SECTION.QUERY: SELECT get_lab_name(camtd.test_lab_id),get_standard_number(standard_id),COUNT(*) from creit_application_master cam, creit_application_model_test_dtl camtd where cam.application_id= camtd.application_id and camtd.test_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 group by get_lab_name(camtd.test_lab_id), get_standard_number(standard_id) order by get_lab_name(camtd.test_lab_id),get_standard_number(standard_id)

SECTION.HEADING: Total models tested per Indian Standard
SECTION.QUERY: SELECT get_standard_number(standard_id),COUNT(*) from creit_application_master cam, creit_application_model_test_dtl camtd where cam.application_id= camtd.application_id and camtd.test_dt between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 group by get_standard_number(standard_id) order by get_standard_number(standard_id)

SECTION.HEADING: Total Registered Users
SECTION.QUERY: select tutm.str_usr,count(str_user_type) from tdc_user_registration tur,tdc_usr_type_mst tutm where tur.str_user_type=tutm.str_usr_type and str_user_type not in ('P') and tur.num_hit_counter!=3 group by tutm.str_usr order by tutm.str_usr

SECTION.HEADING: Registered Users
SECTION.QUERY: select get_user_name(tur.str_user_id),nvl(tur.STR_designation,'-'),tur.STR_E_MAIL,tur.str_user_id,tutm.str_usr from tdc_user_registration tur,tdc_usr_type_mst tutm where tur.str_user_type=tutm.str_usr_type and str_user_type not in ('P') and tur.num_hit_counter!=3 order by tutm.str_usr

SECTION.HEADING: Registered Laboratories
SECTION.QUERY: select lab_name,address,lab_email,lab_contact_no,replace(get_standard_list(lab_id),'@',',') from creit_lab_registration;

SECTION.HEADING: Registered Laboratories
SECTION.QUERY: select ca_name,address,ca_email,ca_contact_no,replace(get_state_list(ca_id),'@',',') from creit_ca_registration;

SECTION.HEADING: Total Registered BIS officers
SECTION.QUERY: select tutm.str_usr,count(str_user_type) from tdc_user_registration tur,tdc_usr_type_mst tutm where tur.str_user_type=tutm.str_usr_type and str_user_type in ('A','D','R','G','B','I') group by tutm.str_usr order by tutm.str_usr

SECTION.HEADING: Registered BIS officers
SECTION.QUERY: select get_user_name(tur.str_user_id),nvl(tur.STR_designation,'-'),tur.STR_E_MAIL,tur.str_user_id,tutm.str_usr from tdc_user_registration tur,tdc_usr_type_mst tutm where tur.str_user_type=tutm.str_usr_type and tur.str_user_type in ('A','D','R','G','B','I') order by tutm.str_usr

REPORT.HEADING: Average time taken for processing Applications
REPORT.NAME: AverageTimeTakenProcessingApplns

SECTION.HEADING: Average time taken for processing Applications
Total Complaints
SECTION.QUERY: select count(*) from creitg_compliant_master where complaint_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1

SECTION.HEADING: Total Complaints for Registered Products
SECTION.QUERY: select count(*) from creitg_compliant_master where complaint_type='Registered' and complaint_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1

SECTION.HEADING: Total Complaints for Unregistered Products
SECTION.QUERY: select count(*) from creitg_compliant_master where complaint_type='UnRegistered' and complaint_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1

SECTION.HEADING: Complaints
SECTION.QUERY: select manufacturer_id,get_product_category(product_category),model_no,tittle,description,to_char(complaint_date,'dd-mm-yyyy'), complainer_name ||',' || address ||',' ||get_city_name(city_id) ||',' || get_state_name(state_id),complaint_type from creitg_compliant_master where complaint_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 order by complaint_type,complaint_date

SECTION.HEADING: Complaints Group by Product Category(Registered Products)
SECTION.QUERY: select get_product_category(product_category),standard_desc,count (*) from creitg_compliant_master where complaint_type='Registered' and complaint_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 group by get_product_category(product_category),standard_desc order by get_product_category(product_category),count (*) desc

SECTION.HEADING: Complaints Group by Product Category(Unregistered Products)
SECTION.QUERY: select get_product_category(product_category),count (*) from creitg_compliant_master where complaint_type='UnRegistered' and complaint_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 group by get_product_category(product_category),standard_desc order by get_product_category(product_category),count (*) desc

SECTION.HEADING: Complaints Group by Organization
SECTION.QUERY: select manufacturer_id,get_product_category(product_category),nvl(standard_desc,'NA'),count (*),complaint_type from creitg_compliant_master where complaint_date between #0 and to_date(#1)+1 group by manufacturer_id,get_product_category(product_category),nvl(standard_desc,'NA'),complaint_type order by get_product_category(product_category),count (*) desc,complaint_type
